text: 21|7|(Napiye!) Umakku munnarum (manitarkalil) ankalaiye tavira veroruvaraiyum nam nam tutaraka anuppavillai. (Umakku arivippatu ponre nam kattalaikalai) avarkalukkum vahyi (mulam) arivittom. Akave, (ivarkalai nokki kuruviraka. Itu) unkalukkut teriyatiruntal (munnulla veta) nanamutaiyavarkalitam kettu arintu kollunkal
